about_the_game:
Use your telekinetic powers to solve the puzzles of the Sacred Lands and uncover the source of the evil threatening them.



Key Features

  • Telekinetic powers: Solve puzzles by absorbing and dropping objects from a distance and through walls, uncover hidden platforms, activate mechanisms remotely, detonate explosives, and more.
  • Special elements: Manipulate objects and enemies, overcome obstacles that nullify your powers, progress through areas that slow you down, navigate through zones with altered gravity, and more.
  • Boss fights: Defeat corrupted spirits through a challenge that is a puzzle in itself, using your wit to figure out how to overcome them.
  • Narrative: Discover the looming threat over the Sacred Lands and its true essence, delve into the history of the spirit that accompanies you, and grasp your role in destiny.
  • Platforming and Skill: Navigate through zones filled with obstacles and traps by combining your powers with your intelligence and agility.

Those chosen to be guardians of the Sacred Lands have preserved the balance for centuries, being relieved at the end of their lives. The great day has come for young Aiden, but he will soon discover that, during his watch, things will be different.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Master telekinesis in this challenging puzzle-platformer. Use unique powers to solve intricate puzzles and overcome clever bosses, while unraveling the mysteries of the Sacred Lands alongside your ancient spirit.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Latin America
